thread.title: Amazing Location
thread.title_full: Amazing Location - Review of Premier Inn London Stratford Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: AJK24
title: Amazing Location
text: We stayed at the Premier Inn Stratford City for one night. The car Park was adjoined and only Â£6 for 24 hours very good for London. The shopping centre was also attached so very convenient. The Olympic Park and Stratford International Station a few yards away so you can get any where you want easily.
